title: The Beginning of Life and Abortion
description: Understanding where life begins is critical to making godly decisions about ethical issues such as abortion, embryonic stem cell research, and fetal tissue transplantation.  It will also help answer questions about what to do with unwanted/unexpected babies from rape or incest, or whether or not it is acceptable to abort a baby to save the mother's life.  All those issues will not be fully and rightly understood apart from God's revelation about the origin and sanctity of human life.
